ho.name: Hands On
ho.description: Gain bonus Super energy on melee kills.

aa.name: Ashes To Assets
aa.description: Gain bonus Super energy on grenade kills.

dy.name: Dynamo
dy.description: Gain bonus Super energy when using your class ability near enemies. (NO DATA)

gk.name: Grenade Kickstart
gk.description: Grenade-Kickstart refunds cooldown whenever your grenade energy is fully depleted. (Works with multiple charges)

mk.name: Melee Kickstart
mk.description: Melee-Kickstart refunds cooldown whenever your melee energy is fully depleted. (DOESN'T works with multiple charges)

mt.name: Momentum Transfer
mt.description: Causing damage with a grenade reduces your melee cooldown. (7 Second Cooldown)

ii.name: Impact Induction
ii.description: Causing damage with a melee attack reduces your grenade cooldown. (7 Second Cooldown)

fs.name: Focusing Strike
fs.description: Grants class ability energy when you cause damage with a melee attack. (7 Second Cooldown)

bd.name: Bolstering Detonation
bd.description: Grants class ability energy when you cause damage with a grenade. (7 Second Cooldown)

iv.name: Invigoration
iv.description: Reduces melee cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

in.name: Innervation
in.description: Reduces grenade cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

is.name: Insulation
is.description: Reduces class ability cooldown each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

ab.name: Absolution
ab.description: Reduces all ability cooldowns each time you pick up an Orb of Power.

of.name: Orbs Of Restoration
of.description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a small amount of energy to your ability with the least energy.

uk.name: Utility Kickstart
uk.description: When your class ability energy is fully expended, you gain class ability energy.

or.name: Outreach
or.description: Reduces melee cooldown when using your class ability.

bo.name: Bomber
bo.description: Reduces grenade cooldown when using your class ability.

ds.name: Distribution
ds.description: Reduces all cooldown when using your class ability near targets.
